QuestData.Title: Shot-Caller
QuestData.Description: <Solar energy courses through the slumbering constructs, their ancient servos whirring to life all around you. It is too late to shut them down now.$B$BOutside, an arakkoa overseer bellows commands, each answered by the buzz of an Apexis beam carving away at the mountain.$B$BThat turret would make short work of the constructs - if you can command it.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Apexis Interface from Overseer Akrath.
QuestData.CompletionText: <A comfortable-looking chair with a socket in the arm rest.>
QuestData.RewardText: <The Apexis interface slides into place with a satisfying click. Seems this is the seat for taking full command of the turret.$B$BRifling through the cushions, you find a few spare coins, which you pocket.>
